{{flagicon|Peru}} Peru 0 - 6 [[Argentina national under-20 football team|Argentina]] {{flagicon|ARG}}
([[Colombia]]; January 17, 2005) | U-20 World cup apps = 0 | Regional name = [[South American Youth Championship]] | Regional cup apps = 23 | Regional cup first = [[South American Youth Championship|1954]] | Regional cup best = 3rd Place, [[South American Youth Championship|1967]] }} '''Peru national under-20 football team''' represents [[Peru]] in international football competitions such as [[South American Youth Championship]]. Peruvian U-20 squad has participated in all [[South American Youth Championship]]s, but had no luck in qualifing to a [[FIFA U-20 World Cup|World Cup]]. Their best appearance was in 1967, finishing in 3rd place. Team managed by [[Juan Carlos Oblitas]] in [[1999 South American Youth Championship|1999]] was the most successful team in the last 10 years. They reached the 5th place. In other appearances during those 10 years, Peru was eliminated in Group Stage, including this year's [[2009 South American Youth Championship|Championship]]. ==FIFA U-20 World Cup record== {|
